content: sheena giraffe and her kid amigurumi giraffe crochet pattern - english only the pattern is written in english and using us crochet terms the pattern is straight forward and easy to follow there is lots of pictures in this pattern lots of step by step images especially on the special parts the unique with this giraffe is that the spots are cross-stitched there will be instruction how to cross-stitch and you will also find a link to my youtube channel where you can see a video about it you need to know the basic crochet skill for amigurumi especially how to work in rounds or spiral some examples of stitches slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet increases and decreases you will find good instructions how to make the legs moveable with only yarn if you don t want to use security joints materials required yarn i used a cotton and acrylic blend dk weight yarn scheepjes soft fun i used 1 5 skeins for the yellow color and less than 1 skein for the brown color for dark brown and beige i used left over yarn in the main pictures i used the colors 2611 yellow 2633 tawny brown 2533 wheat beige and 2491 pecan dark brown for the step pictures i used 2632 tortilla yellow 2631 cedar brown 2533 wheat beige and 2491 pecan dark brown crochet hook 2 5 mm fibrefill / toy stuffing security eyes 10 mm for sheena giraffe security eyes 7 mm for the kid optional 4 security joints only for sheena stitch markers scissor and embroidery needle size sheena giraffe approx 32 cm in height standing kid approx 13 cm in height sitting note when using 2 5 mm crochet hook and the yarn scheepjes soft fun please note these patterns are for personal use only you may make as many items as you wish for yourself or as gifts you may sell any items you produce from this pattern in small quantities but please link back or give credit to me as the designer please do not share reproduce or sell this pattern or any pictures please respect my rights as a designer please follow my instagram account @handmade_by_halime thank you
